tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_activity_texts; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_activity_texts AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, aav.name, team.amp_team_id AS team_id, team.name AS team_name, tm.amp_team_mem_id AS creator_id, usr.last_name || ' ' || usr.first_names AS creator_name, mtm.amp_team_mem_id AS modifier_id, musr.last_name || ' ' || musr.first_names AS modifier_name, aptm.amp_team_mem_id AS approver_id, apusr.last_name || ' ' || apusr.first_names AS approver_name FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN amp_team team ON team.amp_team_id = aav.amp_team_id LEFT JOIN amp_team_member tm ON aav.activity_creator = tm.amp_team_mem_id LEFT JOIN dg_user usr ON tm.user_ = usr.id LEFT JOIN amp_team_member mtm ON aav.modified_by = mtm.amp_team_mem_id LEFT JOIN dg_user musr ON mtm.user_ = musr.id LEFT JOIN amp_team_member aptm ON aav.approvedby = aptm.amp_team_mem_id LEFT JOIN dg_user apusr ON aptm.user_ = apusr.id
